name: Zorpon
description:
Once upon a midnight dreary, a game developer slept weak and wary,

Tossing and turning as fever wrecked a frightful dream eerie;

While he nodded nearly napping suddenly there came a knocking,

Arisen towards slumbering walking stalking to an empty page.

Zorpon was scrawled and forever more.

FAQ

What is Zorpon?

Nice try.

Alright well does Zorpon cost money?

Zorpon will be free to download forever!

Want to keep up with Zorpon's Development? Feel free to follow me on itch for devlogs or twitter for W.I.P screenshots and hints!
